## Flyout.getFlyoutScale() method

Get the scale (zoom level) of the flyout. By default, this matches the target workspace scale, but this can be overridden.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getFlyoutScale(): number;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

number

Flyout workspace scale.
